title: Anyone used Rare rabbit shirts before ?
selftext:
Never used them. How is the quality of their shirts. Getting two shirts at 50 % offer and ends today. Thinking to buy them. Apart from looks, how is their quality and are they durable.  
These are shirts and getting both at 3283 

Black shirt : RARE RABBIT MEN'S NEUTRONS BLACK SHIRT COTTON LYCRA FABRIC SLIM FIT FULL SLEEVE [https://thehouseofrare.com/products/neutrons-black](https://thehouseofrare.com/products/neutrons-black)

Green shirt : RARE RABBIT MEN'S AUXFO DARK GREEN SHIRT FULL SLEEVES SOLID PRINT [https://thehouseofrare.com/products/auxfo-mens-shirt-dark-green](https://thehouseofrare.com/products/auxfo-mens-shirt-dark-green)
